DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate the effect of food on the pharmacokinetics of apixaban administered as commercial image tablets.
DOC.brief_title: Food Effect Study For Apixaban Commercial Image Tablets
DOC.criteria: Healthy volunteers History or evidence of abnormal bleeding or coagulation disorder (eg, easy bruising or gingival bleeding, prolonged bleeding after dental extraction, postpartum, or after trauma, wounds or surgery) and/or having a first degree relative under 50 years of age with a history of abnormal bleeding or coagulation disorder
